text.__SUMMARY__:
Allium funckiifolium is a plant species from Hubei and Sichuan Provinces in China. It brows in moist locales at elevations of 2200–2300 m.Allium funckiifolium is unusual in the genus in producing one large, egg-shaped to heart-shaped leaf up to 25 cm long and 16 cm across. Scape is up to 70 cm tall. Umbel is spherical with many white flowers.
